entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
